name: vscode-copilot-subscription-spend
description: Shows GitHub Copilot subscription spend in the VS Code status bar

commands.title: Copilot Spent: Set Manual Values From Budget Text
Copilot Spent: Diagnose Billing API Access

copilotSpentStatus.org.description: GitHub organization slug. If empty, extension uses personal billing endpoints.

copilotSpentStatus.skuFilter.description: Case-insensitive text filter for matching SKU/budget objects (for example: 'all premium request skus').

copilotSpentStatus.refreshMinutes.description: How often to refresh spend/budget values in minutes.

copilotSpentStatus.githubToken.markdownDescription: Fine-grained Personal Access Token with Account → **Plan: Read-only** permission. **Required** for personal billing. Create at GitHub → Settings → Developer settings → Fine-grained tokens.

copilotSpentStatus.manualSpent.description: Manual fallback spent value (USD) used when personal billing API is unavailable.

copilotSpentStatus.manualBudget.description: Manual fallback budget value (USD) used when personal billing API is unavailable.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
